column5: I've had my boat out twice since last winter and the first time I couldn't get her started (forgot the kill switch).  Finally this weekend I think I'll have time to get it wet again. Can anyone tell me if I'm wasting my time launching at 50 point in Grimsby? If not there, any other suggestions within 75kms?  I'd really like to find some salmon or trout.   Thanks in adavance.  HG
Bill you should buy Huey's boat he's not using it enough
